label: Johns Further Questions 14
description:
Hubert explains the four magical schools, Knight School, Princess Prepatory, Wizard University, and Fairy Godcollege, give tourists some training in being a Knight, a Princess, a Wizard, or a Fairy Godmother before allowing them to experience their fantasy.
He also mentions they're closed, and that's what they're going to figure out.

Hit 1 to continue.

Hit 0 to quit.
